content: last stitches means that ​ those stitches were already completed at the beginning of the round instructions round 1 with color a chain 4 join with slip_stitch to form ring chain 3 11 double_crochet in ring slip_stitch to top of beg ​ chain-3 12 double_crochet round 2 chain 3 double_crochet in blo in same st as join double_crochet in flo in next st double_crochet in blo in same st eleven ​ times slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 fasten_off 24 double_crochet round 3 join color b with slip_stitch in any st beg popcorn in same st 2 double_crochet in next st popcorn in next st ​ eleven times 2 double_crochet in next st slip_stitch to top of beg popcorn fasten_off 24 double_crochet 12 popcorn round 4 when working into popcorn work into the loops of the chain that closes the popcorn join color a ​ with slip_stitch in flo of any popcorn chain 3 double_crochet in blo in same st as join double_crochet in flo in next st double_crochet in blo in next st double_crochet in flo next st double_crochet in blo in same st eleven times double_crochet in flo in next st double_crochet in blo in next st slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 48 double_crochet round 5 chain 1 single_crochet in same and next st single_crochet chain 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 3 st twelve times ​ omitting last 2 st slip_stitch to first single_crochet fasten_off 60 single_crochet 12 chain-3 space round 6 join color c with slip_stitch in any chain-3 space chain 3 4 double_crochet picot 5 double_crochet in same space skip 5 single_crochet 5 ​ double_crochet picot 5 double_crochet in chain-3 space eleven times skip 5 single_crochet slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 120 double_crochet 12 picot copyright 2020 julie yeager designs please do not post this pattern on the internet posting a link to my website -
